title: Welcome to the Chatham Row condominium complex!
description:
Welcome to the Chatham Row condominium complex, located in one of Philadelphia's favorite neighborhoods, Fairmount! This fantastic, freshly painted, bi-level condo has an open concept living/dining room, featuring high ceilings, extra large windows, recessed lighting, ceiling fans, hardwood floors and beautiful exposed brick. The updated kitchen offers granite countertops, ceramic tile flooring and stainless steel appliances. Additionally on the first floor is the updated and modern full bath with large stall shower. Make your way upstairs to find two large bedrooms glowing with natural light, large windows, ceiling fans and charming exposed brick. This conveniently located complex offers common area amenities with free washer/dryer, tons of storage in the basement, a beautifully landscaped patio area - complete with furniture and BBQ grills for outdoor enjoyment and is pet-friendly! Located just south of Fairmount Ave and close to public transportation, all major highways, The Barnes Foundation, Whole Foods, Target, CVS, The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Community College of Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, shopping, dining and all Philadelphia has to offer! Old world charm meets modern finishes, make your appointment today before it's too late!
1508 Mount Vernon St #2F

title: 🔥 BEST PRICING!located in the heart of Fishtown 3BR / 2Ba House!!
description:
Available September 2022!
This beautiful three-story home is located in the heart of Fishtown, which Forbes Magazine described as one of the best neighborhoods to live in the U.S.!
The home has a recently remodeled kitchen with a ton of natural lighting, stainless steel appliances, a built in dishwasher and a wrap around counter for eating, working or hanging out.
There is hard wood flooring throughout the home with a smart Nest thermostat which operates the gas heat and electric central air conditioning. Water is included in your rent. There is full semi-finished basement for storage and laundry.
The patio is also in the process of an update, with a new Moroccan style, tiled wall being built. Included are older and recent pictures of the yard to give you a sense of the space.
There are a total of three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The second floor has one large bedroom and one smaller bedroom, as well as a full bathroom. The third floor master bedroom runs the entire length of the house and also has it's own newly renovated full bathroom with a large soaking bathtub.
This listing is furnished, but if you prefer unfurnished, let us know!
Parking:
There's street parking available with no time limit and no permit required.
We are walking distance to the Market-Frankford line, which will quickly take you to Center City, University City, Old City, South Philly, and more ($2.25 token fee). title: Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)!
description:
Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)! A serene and very private & secured urban oasis surrounded by picturesque landscaping nestled in the heart of coveted Washington Square West. The Parking is optional, and if not needed, the rent would be lowered accordingly. This stunning, light filled 3- story, 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home, with 2 outdoor spaces and a fabulous finished lower level is a must-see! Approaching this very special home, you will first experience the large front patio paved in sleek tile. Then upon entering, open the door to the sun drenched open floor plan featuring the gorgeous kitchen with impressive 42 inch maple cabinetry, stainless appliances & farm house sink, elegant granite counter tops, glass subway tile backsplash, built-in wine rack, a huge breakfast bar with pendant lighting and a picturesque view of the courtyard all open to the living/dining room with floor to ceiling windows and recessed lighting. The second floor offers 2 very spacious bedrooms flooded with natural light, ceiling fans and excellent closet space with decorative closet doors. The renovated hallway bathroom features 2 stylish vessel sink vanities and a tumbled tiled shower. The laundry area completes this floor. Heading to the third floor to the fabulous master bedroom suite with a vaulted ceiling, rolling barn closet doors, recessed lighting, a luxurious master bathroom with 2 modern extra large vanities and an oversized glass tile shower opens to the wonderful private roof top deck! The lower level showcases a spectacular family room with attractive custom built-ins, a powder room and 2 large storage closets. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout every room. There is a large storage shed off the patio. The Parking Spot is located just a half a block away at the corner of Quince & Lombard in a secured lot for separate purchase or rent. First, last & one month's security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant.
1035 Lombard St #4

title: Remarkable 2 bedroom, 2 bath Condo with 1 car parking
description:
This remarkable 2 bedroom, 2 bath Condo with 1 car parking is located at Pier 3 on the Delaware River Waterfront. Situated between Race St. Pier & Penn's Landing, the unit boasts amazing views of the Ben Franklin Bridge with a modern open floor plan and chef's kitchen. Upon entering you are greeted by a private foyer with ample storage space, ascend one flight of stairs to an open breezy hallway where the water awaits. The bright living room features 14 ft high ceilings, ceiling fan, exposed ductwork and a wood burning fireplace. The open kitchen offers plenty of storage, replete with granite countertops, a stainless steel sink with gooseneck faucet, tile backsplash and 42 inch cabinets with undermount lighting. A new dishwasher is being installed. The primary bedroom includes exposed beams, a private newly renovated full bath, 2 closets and balcony that over looks the recently renovated atrium. The second bedroom is spacious and sunny. Full sized laundry is located in the hall guest bath. The pet-friendly building’s amenities include; 24 hour concierge, gated private garage parking, a heated indoor pool, fitness center and a community terrace on the river with extraordinary views. Walking distance to Spruce Street Harbor, Old City & Society Hill’s historic sites, boutiques, nightlife and public transportation. Close to all major highways, bridges and the airport. We welcome your visit today!
3 N Columbus Blvd #TD439

title: Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood!
description:
Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood. This bright one bed/one bath rental is perfectly located in the middle of Philadelphia's historic section (5 minute walk to the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall). Walking distance from a huge number of restaurants, bars, and historic landmarks, you could make the most of this pedestrian's paradise. The property comes with private, in-unit laundry and a great view of center city. While you can walk, or take public transportation, to anywhere you would want to go, the building does have parking available (for an additional $150/month). In addition to the skyline view, the modern kitchen comes with a dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, Refrigerator and an oven/range. The unit is pet friendly for one dog or cat, under 50 lbs. There is a $500 pet deposit, which will be held with the security deposit. Please get in touch to see this wonderfully sunny piece of Philadelphia before it's snatched up.

description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available September 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available September 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.
